item.title: 5 AI trends that made the biggest difference in my life

item.title: Disney didn’t animate Hercules’ Titans for its show on Disney Destiny — it engineered them
item.description: Disney is using exoskeleton technology to engineer Hercules’ Titans for a live show at sea, allowing a single performer to control towering characters aboard the Disney Destiny.

item.title: The Small Details in ‘Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc’ That We Can’t Stop Obsessing Over
item.description: Mappa's film adaptation of Tatsuki Fujimoto's Shonen Jump manga is a gift that keeps on giving.
